page.title: 15TRADESMEN - LACEY GREEN
page.content: THERE ARE MANY SMALL TRADESMEN IN THE AREA AND IT IS POSSIBLE TO GET ALMOST ANYTHING FIXED, FROM A T.V. TO A LEAK- ING ROOF. IN THE LOCALITY ARE SEVERAL SMALL FAMILY BUILDING FIRMS WHO ARE CONSTANTLY BUSY WITH NEW HOUSES AND EXTENSIONS. THERE ARE THREE{PLUMBERS/ {HEATING ENGINEERS, ELECTRICIANS, A {WINDOWCLEANER, JOINERS, AN ODDJOB MAN, {A T.V. REPAIR MAN, A TREE SURGEON AND A NUMBER OF{GARDENERS.}THE FORGE AT LOOSLEY ROW WILL REPAIR FARM MACHINERY AND BRAZE AND WELD, WHILE THOSE EMPLOYED IN THE FURNITURE TRADE CAN OFTEN OBLIGE WITH RESTORATION. IN FACT THERE ARE NOT MANY HOUSEHOLD JOBS WHICH CANNOT BE DEALT WITH BY LOCAL TRADESMEN. INDEED, MORE UNUSUAL PROB- LEMS CAN BE SOLVED. NOT FAR AWAY IS A {STAINED GLASS EXPERT}WHO RECENTLY RE- STORED A WINDOW IN THE PARISH CHURCH.
